text:
Okay, yeah that makes sense.

So for bulk insertions there are ways of doing it from within HubSpot but might be better to do it with a script outside?

We are using Azure Data Factory as orchestration and moving of data, and I saw that they have a connector to pull data from HubSpot. Is there a way to push data back through Data Factory you know of?
do you know if adding a webpage as a blog post in the blog listing page is possible?
does anybody knows  if adding a webpage as a blog post in the blog listing page is possible?

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

I have the blog listing as its own template nad the blog post as its own template. i also want to be able to pull in these custom fields in a blog listings preview module for other pages as well. Is there a way to access these added fields in the modules on another template?

If i want to list all of my blog posts in a module on any page (EX: on the about page using the about template) is there any way to pull in the fields from the modules on the blog page? I need these extra fields for the preview card that doesnt use the basic blog fields that are available.
As you can see in the screenshot I have additional fields that would match the Stroked Text (EX: 74%) and the smaller subtitle "Discount".

Is there anyway to accomplish this with blog posts or are we limitied to just the default fields in a blog post when pulling in all of the posts on another page.
I created a calculation property so i can generate a number based on my form fields, but i cant find it to bring in. anyone experience this?
it should be there, when you are doing the listing, you can print every post and see the content you added, same way i described above

I almost got it. It is not showing me all the fields in the module though. I have an "Images" field that is a repeater of images and then a couple of other text fields. Only the images field is showing on the widget object but not the 3 other text fields
you need to save the blog with data in those fields, im not sure if they will be there if they are empty

it looks like the identifier of the widget module is changing.
so in each rec_post.widgets.body object the module identifier is different for each post  (EX: module_17073466245972 is for the first post but is module_17073454133272 for the next)
looks like the work around is looping through each widget. thanks for the help i appreciate it!
Can’t bring it in the form?
<@U01QVR44MEY> Yeahh I created the property but it’s not in my list of fields to drag in
